violations.title: Browser Pool Not Implemented
violations.description: Browser instances created without pooling mechanism
violations.impact: Moderate impact on test effectiveness and code quality
violations.recommendation: Implement browser instance pooling for resource efficiency

violations.title: Static Browser Configuration
violations.description: Browser list is statically defined without runtime flexibility
violations.impact: Moderate impact on test effectiveness and code quality
violations.recommendation: Implement dynamic browser configuration based on environment

violations.title: Hardcoded MCP Endpoint
violations.description: MCP Playwright endpoint is hardcoded in implementation
violations.impact: Major impact on test quality and maintenance overhead
violations.recommendation: Use configuration-driven endpoint management

violations.title: Generic Element Reference

violations.recommendation: Implement specific element identification strategy

violations.recommendation: Use configurable screenshot naming strategy

violations.title: Generic Error Messages
violations.description: Error messages lack context about test operation that failed
violations.code_snippet: log.Error("Responsive design test failed", map[string]interface{}{"error": err.Error()})

violations.recommendation: Include test context and operation details in error messages
